post.desc:
Looking at it a bit more, maybe Byakuren went to a hairdresser? Seems too styled to be self-cut.

Hmm... 🤔 actually, we don't have a character like that, right? A hairdresser... a barber. An intriguing idea for this would be "barber-surgeons".

You know, barbers (in the West) back then were also more or less physicians. Indeed, the people who cut your hair and trim your beard will also dress your wounds. That's why I think **Eirin** is probably a hairdresser on the side – out of interest to why barbers in Europe would even practice medicine in the first place.
